stanton.name: Stanton System
stanton.description: A corporate-controlled system featuring four planets, each owned by major megacorporations.

pyro.name: Pyro System
pyro.description: A dangerous system controlled by criminal organizations, featuring a volatile star.

terra.name: Terra System
terra.description: The political heart of the UEE, featuring the capital world Terra Prime.

sol.name: Sol System
sol.description: The birthplace of humanity, now a core system of the UEE with historical significance.

magnus.name: Magnus System
magnus.description: An industrial system known for its massive mining operations and shipyards.

nyx.name: Nyx System
nyx.description: A former UEE system now abandoned and filled with derelict ships and stations.

metadata.description: Star Citizen universe systems based on official lore and game data
